name: ruffled feathers scrunchie
notes:
**this is a pay what you want pattern! use the code scrunchie50 for 50% off the original price or use the code scrunchie100 for a free copy. if you download this for free, i’d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️. thank you for your support!

introducing the *ruffled feathers scrunchie* — a dainty, delightful accessory that’s as quick to make as it is cute to wear! this easy crochet pattern features beautiful stitch definition that mimics the soft, wavy look of ruffled feathers, giving your scrunchie a whimsical, textured flair. perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike, it works up in no time and adds a charming handmade touch to any outfit. whether you're keeping it or gifting it, the *ruffled feathers scrunchie* is sure to turn heads and brighten hair days!

this pattern is made with dk weight yarn and a 4.5mm hook. gauge is not crucial in this pattern. it includes two sizes, one for thick hair (l) and one for medium hair (s). the distinction in the sizes are made in the different hair band sizes. for the l size you will want to pick up hair bands specifically made for thick hair and for the s size you will pick up hair bands specifically for medium hair. the sizes will be displayed like this…s,(l). 

there is a section in my pattern called “possibilities” where you can explore all the options of this scrunchie. definitely check that out before starting. my samples all stop after rnd 2, but i encourage you to experiment and see what works for you. this is a beginner friendly pattern, it includes a photo tutorial at the end of the written instructions and uses basic stitches.

thank you for choosing my pattern. i hope you enjoyed it. you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish, but if you share on social media please give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry and link the pattern to its source. if you have any questions or need pattern support, please contact me @stopitharry on ravelry. i appreciate your support!
